Publishes merkel roots for each
batch of events to a immutable log

div.style: text-align: left

div.div: Clients sends a tranasactions Registry service, which verifies it using verifiers and, before being persisted to the Datastore and published.

font.font:
Receives transactions, verifiers them using verifiers before updating the datastore.
Returns queries to data in the registry.
Continually publishes blocks to the Immutable lob.
